definition: the act of hitting vigorously, talk volubly
details:
noun
- the act of hitting vigorously
= synonyms: knock
- a reproach for some lapse or misdeed
= synonyms: blame
- genre of African-American music of the 1980s and 1990s in which rhyming lyrics are chanted to a musical accompaniment
= example: genre of African-American music of the 1980s and 1990s in which rhyming lyrics are chanted to a musical accompaniment
= synonyms: rap music, hip-hop
- voluble conversation
- the sound made by a gentle blow
= synonyms: tap
- a gentle blow
= synonyms: strike
verb
- talk volubly
- to strike sharply
= example: to strike sharply
= synonyms: knap
- perform rap music
- make light, repeated taps on a surface
= synonyms: tap
